about.title: About PushAt
about.description: PushAt is a generic push notification service for atproto services. Register your device with PushAt to easily receive push notifications from supported services.

device.title: Registered Devices
device.registerDescription: Register this device to receive push notifications
device.notRegisteredDescription: This device is not registered yet

notification.notSupportedDescription: Your browser or device does not support push notifications. If you are using a smartphone, you need to install the PWA.
notification.iosInstall: Open in Safari, tap the share button, and select "Add to Home Screen"
notification.androidInstall: Select "Add to Home Screen" from the Chrome menu
notification.swNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support Service Worker.
notification.requestDescription: Permission is required to receive push notifications.
